sentences.sContent: There you are, in the coffin, or in an urn, your body reduced to a husk of meant-to-be's.
sentences.sContent_eng: There you are, in the coffin, or in an urn, your body reduced to a husk of meant-to-be's.
sentences.sCn: 你现在是这副样子，躺在棺材里，或者骨灰盒里。 你的身体沦为一张毫无意思的臭皮囊。

sentences.sContent: All the days of his separation shall he eat nothing that is made of the vine tree, from the kernels even to the husk.
sentences.sContent_eng: All the days of his separation shall he eat nothing that is made of the vine tree, from the kernels even to the husk.
sentences.sCn: 在一切离俗的日子，凡葡萄树上结的，自核至皮所作的物，都不可吃。

sentences.sContent: How can we remove the husk of the grains?
sentences.sContent_eng: How can we remove the husk of the grains?
sentences.sCn: 我们怎样去掉谷物的外皮？

words.tran: 声音沙哑的；有壳的；强壮的
强壮结实之人；爱斯基摩人
剥玉米壳的工作；农家碾米会

trans.tranOther: to remove the husks from grains, seeds etc
the dry outer part of corn, some grains, seeds, nuts etc
